segments.text: How was your education going on in Australia ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to graduate this summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where are you going to work then , in Australia or back in China ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm planning to return to China after graduation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you choosing to leave a foreign country ? Many people are reluctant to leave the superior living environment abroad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think personal development is much more important than simply having a superior living environment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , China's developing so fast and development opportunities can be found almost in every corner of the country .
segments.speaker: S1
